parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Event Handlers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Event Handlers </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Remove a given event handler from the given display. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> display '''displayRemoveEventHandler''' [handler name,id] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display: [[Display]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [handler name,id]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayRemoveEventHandler]] ["keyDown",5];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[disableSerialization]], [[Display]], [[displayAddEventHandler]], [[displayRemoveAllEventHandlers]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 2|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands Take On Helicopters|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 19, 2015 - 21:25 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
If you for example used this code to add the eventHandler:
<code>_myEH = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayAddEventHandler]] ["KeyDown", "[[hint]] [[str]] [[_this]]"];</code>
Then this would be the correct code to remove that eventHandler again:
<code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[displayRemoveEventHandler]] ["KeyDown", _myEH];</code>
</dd>
</dl>
